table-wrap.anchoringText: In the fourth case (Figure 1D), the relationship is not visually observed between the variables, the correlation coefficient is 0,003, which indicates that there is no relationship between the variables. Thus, the value of the correlation coefficient rxy determines the nature and strength of the relationship. To determine the boundary values of the strength of the relationship in the literature on mathematical statistics the Cheddock scale is encountered (Table 1).
table-wrap.label: Table 1
table-wrap.caption: Cheddock scale for determining the strength of the relationship between variables

formatted-caption.caption-text: Cheddock scale for determining the strength of the relationship between variables

table-wrap.anchoringText: To estimate the degree of relationship between the values of the factors under consideration and the amount of residual oil reserves, the residual mobile reserve values obtained from the actualization of the geological and hydrodynamic model (GHM) of the Lovinskoye deposit were used. Values of residual mobile reserves in the borehole area were used as variable yi, and values of all the factors - as variables xi. As a result, the following values of the correlation coefficient were obtained (Table 2).
table-wrap.label: Table 2
table-wrap.caption: Results of correlation evaluation between the factors under consideration and the value of residual oil reserves

formatted-caption.caption-text: Results of correlation evaluation between the factors under consideration and the value of residual oil reserves

tr.td: Total operating time of production wells
Average oil production rate for the production history

table-wrap.anchoringText: In comparison, three specialists complete the adjustment of the geological and hydrodynamic model in a month. One specialist constructs probability maps and maps of products in two days. For example, Table 3 gives an approximate estimate of economic indicators with equal pay terms and qualifications of specialists. However, it should be noted that the described algorithm for constructing probability maps acts as an express method for estimating the presence of residual oil reserves and is not a substitute for reservoir simulation.
table-wrap.label: Table 3
table-wrap.caption: Estimation of economic indicators
